attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is time for the BBC to compete for audience figures like every other tv company . Recent incidents featured in the news, shows that having a liscence fee does not ensure that we have good quality , honest tv productions and news . In addition , why should we send people to jail for not having a liscence fee ? Its like sending someone to jail for not paying a parking fine ! Its ridiculous !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
